name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark theme for Telegram's Web version

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension provides a dark theme for Telegram's Web version

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It only modifies some default Telegram CSS styles, so you shouldn't worry about any malicious JS.

Feel free to post your suggestions and found bugs!

Thanks for installing!
